name: ErrorStatsServiceClient
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceClient
description: An API for retrieving and managing error statistics as well as data for individual events.

methods.name: project_path
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceClient.project_path
methods.description: Returns a fully-qualified project resource name string.

params.name: credentials
params.description: Provides the means for authenticating requests made by the client. This parameter can be many types. A Google::Auth::Credentials uses a the properties of its represented keyfile for authenticating requests made by this client. A String will be treated as the path to the keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A Hash will be treated as the contents of a keyfile to be used for the construction of credentials for this client. A GRPC::Core::Channel will be used to make calls through. A GRPC::Core::ChannelCredentials for the setting up the RPC client. The channel credentials should already be composed with a GRPC::Core::CallCredentials object. A Proc will be used as an updater_proc for the Grpc channel. The proc transforms the metadata for requests, generally, to give OAuth credentials.

params.name: scopes
params.description:
The OAuth scopes for this service. This parameter is ignored if
an updater_proc is supplied.

params.name: client_config
params.description:
A Hash for call options for each method. See
Google::Gax#construct_settings for the structure of
this data. Falls back to the default config if not specified
or the specified config is missing data points.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The default timeout, in seconds, for calls made through this client.

params.name: metadata
params.description: Default metadata to be sent with each request. This can be overridden on a per call basis.

params.name: exception_transformer
params.description:
An optional proc that intercepts any exceptions raised during an API call to inject
custom error handling.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting"

error_stats_service_client = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::ErrorStats.new(version: :v1beta1)
formatted_project_name = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorStatsServiceClient.project_path("[PROJECT]")

# TODO: Initialize +time_range+:
time_range = {}

# Iterate over all results.
error_stats_service_client.list_group_stats(formatted_project_name, time_range).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
error_stats_service_client.list_group_stats(formatted_project_name, time_range).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: project_name
params.description:
[Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as projects/ plus the Google Cloud Platform project ID.

Example: projects/my-project-123.

params.name: time_range
params.description: [Optional] List data for the given time range. If not set a default time range is used. The field time_range_begin in the response will specify the beginning of this time range. Only ErrorGroupStats with a non-zero count in the given time range are returned, unless the request contains an explicit group_id list. If a group_id list is given, also ErrorGroupStats with zero occurrences are returned. A hash of the same form as Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::QueryTimeRange can also be provided.

params.name: group_id
params.description: [Optional] List all ErrorGroupStats with these IDs.

params.name: service_filter
params.description: [Optional] List only ErrorGroupStats which belong to a service context that matches the filter. Data for all service contexts is returned if this field is not specified. A hash of the same form as Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ServiceContextFilter can also be provided.

params.name: timed_count_duration
params.description: [Optional] The preferred duration for a single returned +TimedCount+. If not set, no timed counts are returned. A hash of the same form as Google::Protobuf::Duration can also be provided.

params.name: alignment
params.description:
[Optional] The alignment of the timed counts to be returned.
Default is +ALIGNMENT_EQUAL_AT_END+.

params.name: alignment_time
params.description: [Optional] Time where the timed counts shall be aligned if rounded alignment is chosen. Default is 00:00 UTC. A hash of the same form as Google::Protobuf::Timestamp can also be provided.

params.name: order
params.description:
[Optional] The sort order in which the results are returned.
Default is +COUNT_DESC+.

params.name: page_size
params.description:
The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API
response. If page streaming is performed per-resource, this
parameter does not affect the return value. If page streaming is
performed per-page, this determines the maximum number of
resources in a page.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ErrorGroupStats instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/error_reporting"

error_stats_service_client = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::ErrorStats.new(version: :v1beta1)
formatted_project_name = Google::Cloud::ErrorReporting::V1beta1::ErrorStatsServiceClient.project_path("[PROJECT]")

# TODO: Initialize +group_id+:
group_id = ''

# Iterate over all results.
error_stats_service_client.list_events(formatted_project_name, group_id).each do |element|
  # Process element.
end

# Or iterate over results one page at a time.
error_stats_service_client.list_events(formatted_project_name, group_id).each_page do |page|
  # Process each page at a time.
  page.each do |element|
    # Process element.
  end
end

params.name: project_name
params.description: [Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as +projects/+ plus the Google Cloud Platform project ID. Example: +projects/my-project-123+.

params.name: group_id
params.description: [Required] The group for which events shall be returned.

params.name: service_filter
params.description: [Optional] List only ErrorGroups which belong to a service context that matches the filter. Data for all service contexts is returned if this field is not specified. A hash of the same form as Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ServiceContextFilter can also be provided.

params.name: time_range
params.description: [Optional] List only data for the given time range. If not set a default time range is used. The field time_range_begin in the response will specify the beginning of this time range. A hash of the same form as Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::QueryTimeRange can also be provided.

params.name: page_size
params.description:
The maximum number of resources contained in the underlying API
response. If page streaming is performed per-resource, this
parameter does not affect the return value. If page streaming is
performed per-page, this determines the maximum number of
resources in a page.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation

returns.description:
An enumerable of Google::Devtools::Clouderrorreporting::V1beta1::ErrorEvent instances.
See Google::Gax::PagedEnumerable documentation for other
operations such as per-page iteration or access to the response
object.

methods.name: delete_events
title: Google
Cloud
ErrorReporting
V1beta1
ErrorStatsServiceClient#delete_events
methods.description: Deletes all error events of a given project.

params.name: project_name
params.description: [Required] The resource name of the Google Cloud Platform project. Written as +projects/+ plus the Google Cloud Platform project ID. Example: +projects/my-project-123+.

params.name: options
params.description:
Overrides the default settings for this call, e.g, timeout,
retries, etc.

params.name: yield
params.description: Access the result along with the RPC operation
